channel.title: Belarus on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in Belarus on Rusland 1

item.title: Грязь – People Hatred (Я ненавижу людей)
item.description: Hating and Drowning Hating (ненавидеть) is a transitive verb – being hated does something to a person – and is therefore typically in the accusative case . But here, it’s the genitive (plural genitive) because, like it or not, people are living beings.

item.title: Molchat Doma (Молчат Дома)
item.description: Molchat Doma x Ploho The link with Ploho is often made. Both bands maintain friendly relations and, in 2019, recorded По краю острова together ( lyrics , lyrics with translation ). See also An Introduction to Russian Post-Punk with Ploho and Molchat Doma (Post-punk.

item.title: Би-2 – Hipster
item.description: London vibes Узкие джинсы, майка с принтом = skinny jeans and a shirt with a print. This rhymes with В целом не важно что будет потом: generally, it doesn’t matter what comes after. Лечь на дно (lit.: lie on the bottom) with your London music (вместе с музыкой Лондона), all gone by (всё прошло) and out of style (всё такое не модное).
